text: A design of a green frog variety, donning a pair of swimming goggles on its head, set in a human-like daily life context. The frog is comfortably seated at a wooden desk scattered with books and stationery, by a window. The outside view from the window shows it's a rainy day. The frog, with a thoughtful expression, is seen jotting down notes, creating a humorous and unexpected scene of a frog seemingly performing human activities.
